 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחוֺז‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==city== (Assyrian loan-word; from <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ma—âzu***</u></abbr>, ***city***, [[BDB#Asrb.|Asrb]]<sup>Annals iii.115 and often</sup>; see [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 271</sup>; compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחוֺזָא‎</span> ***market-place, province***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***small town***) — only construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּנְחֵם אֶלמְֿחוֺז‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶפְצָם‎</span> [[Ps.107.30|Ps 107:30]] ***and he guided them unto the city of their desire.***
